Mandate: Receive, analyze, and disseminate suspicious transaction reports (STRs) from banks, casinos, and insurance firms to law enforcement partners.
TopPriorities: Process STRs tied to cross-border revenue repatriation within 48 hours.
Improve compliance training for fintech start-ups.
Strengthen case referrals to ACC and Economic Crimes Court.
ActiveOperations: Real-time money laundering risk dashboard tracking high-value remittances.
Digital onboarding of reporting entities with intelligence systems.
Regional FIC collaboration with COMESA on financial monitoring.

RecentActions.Title: Processed suspicious transaction reports
RecentActions.Summary: Analyzed and forwarded STRs to law enforcement for investigation.

RecentActions.Title: AML data collaboration workshop
RecentActions.Summary: Synchronized financial data feeds to identify unusual patterns.

Strengthen case referrals to ACC and Economic Crimes Court.
ActiveOperations: Real-time money laundering risk dashboard tracking high-value remittances.
Digital onboarding of reporting entities with intelligence systems.
Regional FIC collaboration with COMESA on financial monitoring.
